pic1_alt: A bar plot titled Where do you Brew Coffee? At home is highest with 92% of respondents, followed by at the office with 36%, at a coffee 29%, on the go 18%, and none of these around 1%. Credit: Robert McKeon Aloe, https://rmckeon.medium.com/great-american-coffee-taste-test-breakdown-7f3fdcc3c41d
pic2_alt: Marketing photo from cometeer.com of a box labeled Cometeer x James Hoffman The Great American Taste Test. The box says to keep the contents frozen. In front of the box is the interior coffee box, containing two capsules each of four coffees.
